name: StarFlight: A Star Wars Fangame
description:
StarFlight is a work in progress Star Wars fangame that puts you in the boots of a starfighter pilot.

The fighters in StarFlight run on relatively complex flight mechanics, with modular damage, unique handling and weapons, and lore-friendly stats for each individual ship. The game features both a third and first person control and currently features a multiplayer Team Deathmatch gamemode.

This is a long-term project that will recieve frequent updates. The eventual goal is to feature a single player campaign with friendly and enemy AI, as well as many more maps, gamemodes and fighters

Available Maps:

-Tatooine

Available Ships:

-TIE/LN Fighter

-TIE/IN Interceptor

-T-65 X-Wing

-R60 T-Wing

If you'd like to participate in playtests or be updated in progress, please join our discord

https://discord.gg/zzawEAq9nd

Networking / Replication programmer: To help us solve networking sync issues and more

UI Designer: To make the UI look less bad

Level Designers: To help us flesh out the map and make new ones

Any Programmers: To help us polish, improve, and create new gameplay mechanics

If you'd like to help, please join the discord above and contact KV or say so in the general chat
